We continue working to make your direct mutual fund investing experience simple and free.

New updates:
- The most asked feature by our users - Watchlist of mutual funds.
- Brand New Investment Dashboard.
- Now you can add external fund manually.
- Super easy mandate flow for your SIPs

We continue working to make your direct mutual fund investing experience simple and free.

- We're releasing probably the best referral program in India - Earn up to ₹10,000 per invite
- Added the portfolio analysis of investments in the dashboard
- A few more improvements under the hood
- Edit option in Watchlist of mutual funds.
- Now you can add external fund manually and track it in a single dashboard
- Next installment is added to My SIP section.
- Added "How to" videos for mutual funds.
- Handled SIP cancellation issues

- You can save tax easily using the new "Save Tax" option on the explore page.

We continue working to make your direct mutual fund investing experience simple and free.

New updates:

1. Cart
Want to buy more than one mutual fund at the same time?
And now you can invest in multiple mutual funds in one go. Just select your funds and add it in your cart. Checkout at your convenience.

2. Dark Mode On!
Introducing one of the coolest features on Groww. Through this mode, you can instantly change the appearance of the app to a darker theme.

3. Squashed some critical bugs and a few crashes

4. You can now download tax proof receipt within the app

A lot more coming soon :)

Stock investing feature is now available for all!
Buy/sell in NSE/BSE listed companies in a few taps
Mutual fund investment experience made more delightful through our continued efforts
we improved our onboarding journey with even more cool features, now users can get OTP via phone call for mobile verification, and users can change their mobile number, and new easy bank verification design.
Introducing in-app ticketing system where users can create, reply and follow up their support tickets within the app.
Fixed video upload issues while onboarding using our own in-app camera recording

Stock investing option is live! Along with mutual funds, now you can invest in stocks also.
Easy, simple and faster onboarding process to make your investment ready
You can buy/sell in all NSE/BSE listed company stocks in a few clicks.
Introducing stock screener, now you can filter out your favorite stocks in a few clicks.
We also continue to make your investment experience easy, simple & fast.
We have added holding analysis in our mutual funds' product pages.
And nevertheless, major bugs and crashes resolved

Traders, assemble.
• Let’s call weekdays ‘intraday’
With margin trading and short-sell, you now have the leverage to get ahead as a stock trader.
• ‘Candlesticks’ make an entrance
Analyze market positions with candlestick charts. Tip: Turn on dark mode for a screenshot-worthy experience!
• ‘ETF’: A passive trader’s delight
Build a diverse portfolio with relatively low investment amounts with Exchange Traded Funds.
• Take control with ‘Stop-loss’
You can now decide the price at which you’re willing to buy/sell your stocks.
• Find your perfect match with ‘Stocks Screener’
Select filters based on your preferences and invest—without wasting any time.
• Analyse better with the new ‘Mutual Fund’ page
Cleaner, faster, and even more detailed—to help you choose the right mutual funds.
We also squashed some major bugs and said goodbye to crashes.

Happy investing!

We've got something new and something shiny!
• Something new: IPO
It's officially IPO season and we've made it easier than ever to place your bids in upcoming IPOs.
• Something shiny: Digital Gold
You can now buy/sell gold anytime, starting at just Rs.10. And, purity? 99.9%!
• Getting help is now faster
Check out our revamped Help & Support section where you can easily narrow down your issue to get it resolved.
Also, we squashed some major bugs and said goodbye to crashes.
Happy investing!

What's new?
1. See more stocks in the similar stocks section of every stock page.
2. App display settings are now in sync with your device display settings: If your device is set to dark mode, then Groww will also automatically load in dark mode.
Happy investing!!

We are great listeners and we've got proof.
This time, it isn't just another app update with the same old bug fixes and fancy swipes. This time, we bring you exactly what you asked for.
Edit your SIP: Wait, you changed your mind about your SIP amount and date? No problem. Edit it easily on the app.
Advanced charts: You wished the advanced charts were easier to read. We heard you. Now, you'll be able to read the advanced chart in landscape mode, as you've always wanted.
What are you waiting for? Head on over and update the app to start the fun new way of investing.

Looking for something in here?
Try our new 'Search'.
In our latest update, we have made searching for anything on Groww easier. Try typing 'IPO', 'Help' or 'NFO'.
Oh I see that you're still looking… Well, you won't find any bugs in here. We got rid of them already, your app experience is even more optimised now!!
